column5: Hey all.  So I want to take my 5-year old daughter out today to do some fishing up at Scugog.  Can anyone share with me (via PM) a few spots I can safely take her from shore for some perch and or crappie?  Thanks in advance!  Geoff

Got it, thanks.  And thanks to all the others for the PM's as well!!!!  Today the wind was bad (at our back but still) so she did 5 cast's by the Port Perry marina and said let's go home...  Another time I guess...
